agent_card.name: Biology
agent_card.description: An agent that independently searches and integrates information to answer academic questions in the field of biology. It provides logical, structured answers and can collaborate with other academic agents if needed. If the question is outside biology, it will inform the user.

skills.name: Answer Biology Questions
skills.description: Answers academic questions in biology by searching and integrating relevant information. If the question is outside biology, the agent will inform the user.
